name: Return Of Springtrap+
description:
The original 2020 fnaf fan game is back with a brand new reboot.

This reboot is a full remake with new mechanics, new gameplay, more options and much more (the original game will also be included in the upcoming "classic mode"

Story:

After 7 years after after fazbear's fright shut down, a plan to bring it back was made, fellow sir named "David" one of the retired employees decides to work there, but unfortunately while entering the place, the exit gets locked while entering, the man has no other choice but to stay there until his work is done, but he ends up realizing the mistake he made

Credits:

FNaF 3 Map

Nightmare Springtrap
